entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 09:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
